summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.0°C) and outside temperature (down 6.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 12444 lux) and cloud levels (up 697 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14158 lux) and cloud levels (up 1645 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 696.8m lower than yesterday, 633.6m lower than the past week, 1644.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1027.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Chance of light rain, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Changeable conditions.
